name: Rosegold
description:
Rosegold is a 2d maze puzzle game where you explore a forest looking for small mushroom people that are lost in the forest. Solve puzzles and save all the mushrooms

you save the mushrooms by interacting with them when they are buried

to complete the level you must get to the rose at the end of the maze.

Controls

Move - Arrow keys

Shift - run 

E - Interact

R - Restart level

School

Northwest Career & Technical Academy

Class

Video Game Development

Team

Kohl: programmer

Roman: graphics

Ryan: sound effects
